::Ramulus::

The pod touches down in North America, on a place which would be Florida in 
several dozen millenia, the door opening. Ramulus stands up.

"We're here," he says, exiting as he takes out his gun just in case. He looks 
down at the map that he has in his other hand.

"According to this map, its that way," he says, pointing in a direction.
